text: Trump's Bizarre Moments With Dr. Phil and Hannity Should Alarm Us All  —  During just this week, two of Donald Trump's friendliest interviewers handed him big prime-time opportunities to unequivocally renounce any intention to retaliate against Democrats for his criminal conviction by a jury of his peers in Manhattan.
